Luxury Appliance Repair in Holmby Hills, CA

White-Glove Service for the World's Most Distinguished Homes

In Holmby Hills, luxury is a legacy. Every estate, every detail reflects a commitment to excellence—and your high-end appliances are no exception. Whether it’s a Sub-Zero built-in refrigerator, a Wolf dual-fuel range, or a La Cornue masterpiece oven, your appliances were chosen for their beauty, performance, and prestige.

When your appliances need expert care, trust the company that understands luxury not just as a word, but as a standard. At Luxury Appliance Repair by Zaricci, we deliver certified, white-glove appliance repair in Holmby Hills, specializing in elite brands with precision craftsmanship, authentic OEM parts, and an unmatched level of discreet, professional service.

🔧 Why Holmby Hills Residents Choose ZARICCI

  • ✅ Mastery of Luxury Brands
    Our technicians are trained and certified by the world’s most exclusive appliance manufacturers, from Sub-Zero and Wolf to Miele, Gaggenau, Thermador, Viking, and La Cornue.
  • ✅ Genuine OEM Parts
    We repair your appliances using only manufacturer-certified parts, maintaining optimal performance, preserving warranties, and ensuring lasting quality.
  • ✅ Same-Day or Next-Day Service
    In a neighborhood where time is a true luxury, we offer priority scheduling with guaranteed punctuality—and service tailored to your needs.
  • ✅ White-Glove Standards at Every Step
    From protective coverings to meticulous clean-up, we treat your home and appliances with the respect and attention they deserve.

Discretion. Precision. Excellence. Always.

🛠️ High-End Appliances We Service in Holmby Hills

❄️ Luxury Refrigerators & Freezers

  • Sub-Zero, Thermador, Miele
  • Cooling inconsistencies
  • Ice maker malfunctions
  • Water dispenser or seal issues
  • Integrated and panel-ready unit repairs

🔥 Ranges, Ovens & Cooktops

  • Wolf, La Cornue, Gaggenau, Viking
  • Burners not igniting
  • Oven not heating or cooking unevenly
  • Convection fan, steam oven, or smart connectivity repairs

🚿 Luxury Dishwashers

  • Miele, Bosch, Cove
  • Not draining or drying
  • Leaks or cycle errors
  • Smart feature or touchscreen control issues

🧺 Luxury Washers & Dryers

  • Miele, LG Signature, Fisher & Paykel
  • Drum failures
  • Overheating or non-drying dryers
  • Smart diagnostic and connectivity problems

☕ Built-In Specialty Appliances

  • Espresso machines, wine coolers, warming drawers
  • Temperature regulation issues
  • Motor, fan, or pump replacements
  • Smart home and Wi-Fi integration troubleshooting

👨‍🔧 The ZARICCI Signature Repair Experience

  1. Schedule with Ease
    Book by phone or online—our concierge team handles every detail professionally and discreetly.
  2. On-Time Arrival and Diagnosis
    Our certified technicians arrive fully prepared, wearing protective gear, and conduct a respectful, thorough evaluation.
  3. Clear, Detailed Estimate
    We provide a transparent, written quote—explaining every step before any work begins.
  4. Precision Repairs Using OEM Parts
    We perform repairs with brand-approved components, restoring the original beauty and functionality of your appliance.
  5. Final Testing and White-Glove Clean-Up
    After meticulous testing, we leave your space spotless—and your appliances operating flawlessly.
